title: Himi 388
lyrics:
8.8.8.8. Mo e tau
Ko Vaiola
1.
Te ta lava he fonua,
He fonua ‘i he kauvai?
Nofo’anga he ‘Otua,
Mo e kau ‘āngelo tokolahi?
‘Io, te ta ‘eve’eva
He potu monu’ia ‘i he kauvai
‘Io te ta inu he Vaiola,
Tafe mei he taloni ‘o Langi.
2.
Vai ‘asini ‘a Vaiola,
Vai melie ange fau.
Inu ai ‘o ‘ikai kona,
Inu ai ‘o ‘ikai fiu.
‘Io te ta ‘eve’eva etc.
3.
Vai Malumalu ‘a Vaiola,
Tu’u hokohoko ‘a e ‘akau;
Fua he mahina kotoa,
Ko e me’a faito’o hono lau,
‘lo te ta ‘eve’eva etc.
4.
Mole ai e kumi maama:
‘Aho ‘ikai ai ha pō.
Ko e Lami hono la’ā;
La’ā ia ‘e ‘ikai tō
‘Io, te ta ‘eve’eva etc.
5.
Hokosia ‘a Vaiola,
Pea u toki ‘ilo ai:
Hoku tauhi ‘a Sihova,
‘E ‘ikai ha masiva ‘e fai,
‘Io, te ta ‘eve’eva etc
6.
Ko e mala kuo ngata,
Tupu pē ‘a e monū’ia,
Holo ai e lo’imata,
Ngalo ai e ongosia.
‘Io, te ta ‘eve’eva
He potu monu’ia ‘i he kauvai:
‘Io te ta inu he Vaiola,
Tafe mei he taloni ‘o Langi.*
